value:
This body is my wish...for change
in a crooked world. Tremendous
power is necessary.

To put an end to a bloody history,
someone must stand up, even if some
call it self-righteous...

My progress cannot be stopped.
All who oppose me will fall to ruin.
There can only be one true ruler.

If you believe the weak will remain
weak, look again when they are
no longer forced to rely on others...

The goddess ignores the pleas of the
faithful, and countless souls are lost.
That is the crookedness of this world!

I am the one who will free this
world of its corruption—together
with $Nf.

We must trample the past underfoot.
We must move onward to a tomorrow
that is brighter still!
The weak will be scattered.
Without power, nothing changes.

I will change the world—by any
means necessary!

I am emperor of the Adrestian
Empire, Edelgard. With my power,
I will reshape the crooked world...

The longer change takes, the more
who fall victim to injustices of our
current era...$k$pMy wish is to bring change about
as quickly as possible. That is why
I chose the path of war...$k$pIf fewer people suffer in war than
would suffer under the present
circumstances, that is a victory.$k$pFools imprisoned by their situation,
with no vision for future possibilities...
They are betrayers of progress.$k$pYou may try, but not even you can
stop me. I must continue down the
path I've chosen—no hesitation!
ふっ
はっ
ぐっ
ぎゃああっ
Perish.
I am absolute.
Crumble to ash.
Face your mortality.
My path ends here...
Why!
I am Edelgard von Hresvelg. The one who will free this world of its corruption.
I will not suffer child's play. That piece of my heart is no more.
We must trample the past underfoot, and move onward to a brighter tomorrow!
My progress cannot be stopped, no matter how many people try.
These fools cannot see the future ramifications at stake...
There can only be one ruler of the world...
Facing you... I grow weak...
Yes.
What?
Out of my way...
